database.name: VIEW SSVE_VIATICAL_DETAILS_AUX4
database.view: SELECT ssve_viatical_details_aux3.ssve_viatical_id, ssve_viatical_details_aux3.ssve_viatical_settlement_id, sum(ssve_viatical_details_aux3.totalamt_sett) AS totalamt_sett, ssve_viatical_details_aux3.sfb_budget_cert_line_id FROM ssve_viatical_details_aux3 GROUP BY ssve_viatical_details_aux3.ssve_viatical_id, ssve_viatical_details_aux3.ssve_viatical_settlement_id, ssve_viatical_details_aux3.sfb_budget_cert_line_id
